sourceContent:
Meeting: Grapevine Connectors Standup
Type: Scheduled
Started: 2025-11-13T18:00:33.568+00:00
Ended: 2025-11-13T18:33:56.275+00:00

Participants:
  - Chandler (croth@gather.town) joined at 2025-11-13T18:00:36.128+00:00, left at 2025-11-13T18:26:26.097+00:00
  - Jonathas (jdantas@gather.town) joined at 2025-11-13T18:00:40.259+00:00, left at 2025-11-13T18:26:24.960+00:00
  - Recording () joined at 2025-11-13T18:02:04.409+00:00
  - konrad (kschultz@gather.town) joined at 2025-11-13T18:01:37.459+00:00, left at 2025-11-13T18:26:25.565+00:00


Meeting Memos:

Meeting Memo

Summary:
The team reviewed a blocking issue with the Zendesk connector: a global OAuth app cannot function without a corresponding Marketplace app. Konrad will assemble and submit the Marketplace listing (marketing copy, icons, screenshots) and press Zendesk support daily for faster approval; once complete he will resume Asana work. Chandler aims to ship the new health-check system and a first draft of the Connectors v2 design doc to staging today, and will investigate a customer-reported Google Drive webhook problem. Jonathas updated webhook logic, migrated code to the new folder structure, and targets a Snowflake collector prototype by end-of-day. The group also brainstormed a modular registration approach and feature-flag strategy for future connectors.

Notes:

Current Engineering Work:
  - Chandler: health-check system refactor; target deploy to staging today
  - Google Drive webhook incident under investigation (possible overlap with Gmail mechanism)
  - Jonathas: new webhook auth enum, Notion webhook updates, folder restructure complete
  - Snowflake collector design & prototyping underway; leveraging AI for tool overview

Action Items:
  - description='Investigate Google Drive webhook issue reported by Kumel and report findings' due_date=None assignee='Chandler'

Transcript:
  - 346c2afe-bd00-42f2-926b-8ca822cb86bf|Chandler: And then.
  - 346c2afe-bd00-42f2-926b-8ca822cb86bf|Chandler: Kumel flagged an issue with Google Drive.
  - 346c2afe-bd00-42f2-926b-8ca822cb86bf|Chandler: So there was some webhook issue that a customer was facing there. So I'm going to investigate that today and see what's going on.
  - 88061651-6a26-450f-b15b-3c10cb964201|Jonathas: Is it related also kind of to the Gmail one?
  - 346c2afe-bd00-42f2-926b-8ca822cb86bf|Chandler: I don't know if it's for Gmail, they only recommend.
  - 346c2afe-bd00-42f2-926b-8ca822cb86bf|Chandler: They only said they were having problem this customers having problems with Google Drive.
  - 346c2afe-bd00-42f2-926b-8ca822cb86bf|Chandler: So I don't think they have Gmail configured, but I can double check that. But it could potentially be something that's also impacting Gmail, even though Gmail has like a slightly different webhook setup than Google Drive.
  - 88061651-6a26-450f-b15b-3c10cb964201|Jonathas: Yeah. One is by comparison. Right. By token. Comparison. The other one is.
  - 88061651-6a26-450f-b15b-3c10cb964201|Jonathas: Yeah, I forgot the name of the other one.
  - 346c2afe-bd00-42f2-926b-8ca822cb86bf|Chandler: The other one is using, like, cloud pub sub or whatever.
  - 346c2afe-bd00-42f2-926b-8ca822cb86bf|Chandler: Yeah.
  - 88061651-6a26-450f-b15b-3c10cb964201|Jonathas: Yeah, that's the one that I think Rick changed.
  - 346c2afe-bd00-42f2-926b-8ca822cb86bf|Chandler: Yeah.
  - 346c2afe-bd00-42f2-926b-8ca822cb86bf|Chandler: Anyways, I'll report back on what's going on there. Just in our. In our channel.
  - 346c2afe-bd00-42f2-926b-8ca822cb86bf|Chandler: Because we've had some weird issues with Google Drive webhooks for quite a while.
  - 346c2afe-bd00-42f2-926b-8ca822cb86bf|Chandler: So I'd like to.
  - 346c2afe-bd00-42f2-926b-8ca822cb86bf|Chandler: Solve this once and for all.

createData.title: Investigate Google Drive webhook issues
createData.description:
Investigate Google Drive webhook issues.

Per 2025-11-13 standup:

Investigate customer-reported incident (via Kumail) and report findings

Check for overlap with the Gmail webhook mechanism that might explain behavior
